channel.title: CVE Feed for Arm Ltd -- Valhall GPU Kernel Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arm Ltd -- Valhall GPU Kernel Driver

item.title: CVE-2023-5091|2024-01-08T09:23:35.019Z -- arm%20ltd -- valhall%20gpu%20kernel%20driver
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Arm Ltd Valhall GPU Kernel Driver allows a local non-privileged user to make improper GPU processing operations to gain access to already freed memory. This issue affects Valhall GPU Kernel Driver: from r37p0 through r40p0.

item.title: CVE-2023-4295|2023-11-14T22:47:00.567Z -- arm%20ltd -- valhall%20gpu%20kernel%20driver
item.description: A local non-privileged user can make improper GPU memory processing operations to gain access to already freed memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-34970|2023-10-03T16:44:14.509Z -- arm%20ltd -- valhall%20gpu%20kernel%20driver
item.description: A local non-privileged user can make improper GPU processing operations to access a limited amount outside of buffer bounds or to exploit a software race condition. If the system’s memory is carefully prepared by the user, then this in turn could give them access to already freed memory

item.title: CVE-2023-3889|2023-11-14T22:27:03.983Z -- arm%20ltd -- valhall%20gpu%20kernel%20driver
item.description: A local non-privileged user can make improper GPU memory processing operations. If the operations are carefully prepared, then they could be used to gain access to already freed memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-6363|2024-05-03T13:25:19.215Z -- arm%20ltd -- valhall%20gpu%20kernel%20driver
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Arm Ltd Valhall GPU Kernel Driver, Arm Ltd Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture Kernel Driver allows a local non-privileged user to make improper GPU memory processing operations. If the system’s memory is carefully prepared by the user, then this in turn could give them access to already freed memory. This issue affects Valhall GPU Kernel Driver: from r41p0 through r47p0; Arm 5th Gen GPU Architecture Kernel Driver: from r41p0 through r47p0.
